register.reg_long_name: Guarded Control Stack Push exception return record

purpose_text.para: Decrements the current Guarded control stack pointer register by the size of a Guarded control stack exception return record and stores a Guarded control stack exception return record to the Guarded control stack.

access_permission_text.para: Rt should be encoded as 0b11111. If the Rt field is not set to 0b11111, it is CONSTRAINED UNPREDICTABLE whether:

content.para: The instruction behaves as if the Rt field is set to 0b11111.

ps.name: GCSPUSHX
